snippet: The backlash has raised questions about the institution’s priorities, and fueled an escalating national debate over where academic presses fit in the future of publishing.
abstract: Backlash over University of Missouri's decision to close its publishing house raises questions about the institution’s priorities, and fuels an escalating national debate over the necessity of academic presses and their future in the digital world; Missouri's press printed prized academic titles over more than 50 years.
lead_paragraph: The backlash has raised questions about the institution’s priorities, and fueled an escalating national debate over where academic presses fit in the future of publishing.

headline.seo: University of Missouri Press Closing Incites Anger
headline.main: Plan to Close University of Missouri Press Stirs Anger
headline.print_headline: Plan to Close University of Missouri Press Stirs Anger
